price: Gbogbo ìjọba ọjọ́ yẹn ń jẹ́ ti Allāhu tí Ó máa ṣèdájọ́ láààrin wọn. Nítorí náà, àwọn tó gbàgbọ́ ní òdodo, tí wọ́n sì ṣe àwọn iṣẹ́ rere, (wọn yóò wà) nínú àwọn Ọgbà Ìdẹ̀ra.
arabic: ٱلۡمُلۡكُ يَوۡمَئِذٖ لِّلَّهِ يَحۡكُمُ بَيۡنَهُمۡۚ فَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ فِي جَنَّٰتِ ٱلنَّعِيمِ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: al-mul'ku yawma-idhin lillahi yaḥkumu baynahum fa-alladhīna āmanū waʿamilū al-ṣāliḥāti fī jannāti al-naʿīmi
